TopicTitle: What They Found in my Head...

Articles.Content: Yeah, still the same just getting better but really, really slowly.

Awh, for gods sake!

How dangerous would a surgery for that be?

Holy necro (kinda)! But I did glance at [@Fr8monkey](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/76199-fr8monkey/)'s profile and saw a good bit of activity over the past couple of months, so I think it's safe to assume he made it okay. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

Sorry for not keeping up to date.  Honestly, I thought no-one cared much.

I'm doing OK.  Just feels like my head is a fishbowl that is being stirred all the time.  In physical therapy for dizziness; but is going slow.  Don't check the site as much as I used to.  Just tired all the time still... bit alive so there is that!

You know you just made the operation sound like a Soviet Russian wound operation in mid-WWII, right? That just sounds morbid as hell, and makes the OP not just a man, but a damn veteran... ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ":wink:")

Hurray, the Monkey survived our tests!

I am glad you pulled through, man. Best of luck with your recovery, and keep up posted.
Now if they could just make the voices stop...  DOWN WITH THE PROLETARIAT!!!  Sorry, it wont happen again.

By the way: [http://lyricstranslate.com/en/sdelan-v-sssr-%D1%81%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%B2-%D1%81%D1%81%D1%81%D1%80-made-ussr.html](http://lyricstranslate.com/en/sdelan-v-sssr-%D1%81%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%B2-%D1%81%D1%81%D1%81%D1%80-made-ussr.html)

Been a year... what a long, long year.  Physical therapy didn't do much.  Still dizzy and light headed to the point of passing out most of the time, so nothing has changed there.  Now on disability and Social Security since there is no way I can work now. 

Still tired all the time.  Just doing laundry is a chore sometimes.  need to rest most of the time and even gained 45 lbs.  That is the worst part,, so there is that.  Trying to loose it; but isn't easy when yo have no energy.

Thanks for all the thoughts.
These things take years. Be patient. You can play KSP, right? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

One thing we need to fix this problem:

[![spoon-006.jpg](http://kingofwallpapers.com/spoon/spoon-006.jpg)](http://kingofwallpapers.com/spoon.html)

*Owwwwwwwwwwww...*

Glad to see that you made it, I hope everything finishes healing quickly. If you ever need motivation, remember that [this guy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phineas_Gage) had more or less a tunnel in his head, and recovered. And I thought I was so amazing with the hole I had in my back. Also, remember the probiotics after you finish needing antibiotics, as someone else has said.
Probiotics **during** the antibiotic therapy, and after it. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
